title: Never Let Me Go: Secrets And Lies, Book 2
description: He found me. Just when everything was starting to go great in my life, my nightmare came back to haunt me. My heart is broken. Is it possible that Tony has changed for the better? Or am I fooling myself? What lies ahead for Nick and I? WARNING! This book contains graphic descriptions of abuse and lots of hot sexual content. Can pose as a trigger for some. Not for the faint of heart.
author: Roxy Love
